meanings.sent1: The claimer raised their hand to say they found the lost toy.
meanings.sent2: The claimer at the store insisted the item was theirs.
meanings.sent3: The claimer was so excited to finally have proof of their discovery.
meanings.sent4: The claimer stood tall, asserting their right to the treasure.
meanings.sent5: The claimer's voice echoed in the room, declaring ownership.

meanings.definition: A company or organization that makes a claim.
meanings.sent1: The insurance claimer processed the paperwork for the accident.
meanings.sent2: The claimer sent out a press release about their new product.
meanings.sent3: The claimer's logo was proudly displayed on all their products.
meanings.sent4: The claimer's reputation soared as they won another case.
meanings.sent5: The claimer's billboard boldly stated their message for all to see.

meanings.sent1: The quick claimer of the last cookie got to enjoy it first.
meanings.sent2: The claimer of the prize was announced at the event.
meanings.sent3: The claimer of the title waved to the cheering crowd.
meanings.sent4: The claimer of victory raised their arms in triumph.
meanings.sent5: The claimer of the land marked their territory with a flag.
